remarks: The covers relation implies no in-betweenness.  ( ~ cvnbtwn2 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2011.)
statement:
cvrletr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrletr.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cvrletr.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
cvrletr.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrnbtwn2 $p |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ X C Y ) -> ( ( X .< Z /\ Z .<_ Y ) <-> Z = Y ) ) $.
